data.message: I can't use the color background feature on on iOS device. Others can. I can't. Why am I denied this feature. The app is update with the latest version. I find it unfair

replies.message: Hi Jess. If you're not seeing this option after uninstalling and reinstalling your app, please feel free to share your interest in this feature here: http://bit.ly/2nEylo3. -Joe
Thanks for reaching out, Katherine. If you believe a feature isn't working properly, you can report it to us using these steps: http://bit.ly/2p1WSEy. Thanks. -Jessica
